rooms.description: A spacious entrance with an integrated living area featuring Art Deco accents such as geometric patterns and chrome finishes. Vastu principles suggest that the main entry faces east to welcome positive energy.
A multi-functional living space with an open plan design, including a kitchenette, dining area, and sleeping nook. Natural light is maximized through large windows placed on the east-facing side.
Dual-car garage designed with Art Deco detailing in door handles and trims. The layout ensures easy access to the main house entrance following Vastu guidelines.

openings.description: Large, double-settled archway with ornamental detailing. Positioned as per Vastu for maximum auspicious energy flow.
Multiple large windows designed to allow natural light and align with Vastu principles.
